ProMDM

ProMDM is a mobile device management solution that enables companies to remotely control their mobile devices - track status, push new or update existing mobile applications, control access to company's on-line resources, wipe stolen devices etc.

Type of work:

UI Design Frontend Coding

Design of administration user interface, front-end coding in HTML/CSS - Bootstrap/jQuery

Technologies:
  • HTML5
  • CSS3
  • Bootstrap
  • JavaScript
  • jQuery
